title: Equisetum Hyemale (Rough Horsetail), Equisetum Telmateia (Great Horsetail), and Equisetum Hyemale (Rough Horsetail)
description: three separate images of plant stems (a) vertical striations with four lobes; top lobe shaped like a mushroom; (b) pointed plant stem with 19 rows of \'petals\'; (c) straight striated stem with mushroom shaped top lobe
creditline: Gift of Elaine Dines Cox and Kris Cox
